snippet: Mr. David, Stephen Sondheim and Phil Jackson will appear in conversation with contributors to The New Yorker, organizers announced on Sunday.
abstract: Organizers of New Yorker Festival announce that quintessential New Yorkers Larry David, Stephen Sondheim and Phil Jackson will appear in conversation with contributors to The New Yorker.
lead_paragraph: Mr. David, Stephen Sondheim and Phil Jackson will appear in conversation with contributors to The New Yorker, organizers announced on Sunday.

headline.main: New Yorker Festival to Feature Larry David
headline.print_headline: New Yorker Festival to Feature Larry David
